text: Aaron Taylor-Johnson (born Aaron Perry Johnson, 13 June, 1990), known before marriage and previously credited as Aaron Johnson is an English actor. He is best known for the role as Dave Lizewski in Kick-Ass and John Lennon in Nowhere Boy. In 2024, he played Friedrich Harding in Nosferatu. ==References== Category:English movie actors Category:English television actors Category:1990 births Category:Living people
title: Aaron Taylor-Johnson
